summary: The developer has addressed the authorization check issue correctly. The WONT_DO response for the order of operations issue is justified - verified that the app-level implementation in base.py:400-407 does call page.delete() before UserFavorite cleanup, so the API endpoint correctly follows this pattern.

issues.description: Magic number 20 for admin role could be more readable
issues.suggestion: Consider using a constant like ADMIN_ROLE = 20 or importing from a roles module if one exists, though this matches existing codebase patterns

positives: Authorization check properly verifies both owner and admin permissions
Correct use of is_active=True filter to ensure only active members are checked
Implementation correctly follows the established app-level patterns
Good defensive coding with workspace__slug filter in the ProjectMember query
